rows.label: tlk45320152_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard about some kind
of artificial Blade causing
chaos in the capital.

rows.label: tlk45320152_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The gate over there was closed the
whole time, so I imagine the Blade
must have gone across Midorl Bridge.

rows.label: tlk45320152_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Honestly, what were the people guarding
the main gate playing at, letting a
thing like that get through?

rows.label: tlk45320152_02_msg0004
rows.name:
...Not that I can talk, after
I managed to lose the key to
the other gate, haha...
